scripts.build: yarn cp:env && yarn && yarn add:angular && yarn add:react && yarn bootstrap && yarn run:build && yarn lint
scripts.build:local: yarn && yarn add:angular && yarn add:react && yarn bootstrap && yarn run:build && yarn lint
scripts.build:codesandbox: yarn cp:env && yarn bootstrap && yarn run:build
scripts.release:dev: yarn build && git commit -a -m 'chore: build new release' && yarn run prerelease && yarn run publish
scripts.release:dev:patch: yarn build && git commit -a -m 'chore: build new release' && yarn run patch && yarn run publish
scripts.ci:publish:prerelease: lerna publish prerelease --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish prerelease version'
scripts.ci:publish:prepatch: lerna publish prepatch --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish prepatch version'
scripts.ci:publish:patch: lerna publish patch --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish patch version'
scripts.ci:publish:minor: lerna publish minor --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish minor version'
scripts.ci:publish:major: lerna publish major --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish major version'
scripts.lint: yarn eslint && yarn stylelint && yarn prettier:write
